name: Rods from God
description:
In the distant future, with the ceaseless corruption spread rampant across the planet, you decide: enough is enough. This is your chance - to use your technical knowledge against them - to make them pay. You finally break through the toughest security that's ever been conceived and assume control of the deadliest trans-planetary weapon mankind has ever seen - The Rods from God.

- How to Play -

Use your mouse to aim the satellite and hit the enemies' headquarters, as well as the WASD keys to move. Each enemy on the planet will increase the rate at which they regain control of their satellite - ending the game. Survive as long as possible against the increasing difficulty and increase your score.

This game was made in 80 hours for Open Jam 2019, a game jam promoting all things open source. Honoring the guidelines of the jam, the following open source tools and assets were used:

GIMP - Open source image editor

Audacity - Open source audio editor

Blender - Open source 3D object/mesh IDE

Art assets from opengameart.org, including:

https://opengameart.org/content/buransk-asset-pack-cc0

https://opengameart.org/content/stylized-earth-models

https://opengameart.org/content/space-skyboxes-1

https://opengameart.org/content/60-cc0-sci-fi-sfx
